languages.text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by +2 for every instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} it suffers.

languages.text: На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо увеличивает свое {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 2 за каждый случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび毎に{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en +2 cada vez que recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en +2 cada vez que recibe daño.

languages.text: Erleidet diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, erhöht sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} um +2.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhöht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang immer wenn sie Schaden nimmt ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} um +2.

languages.text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de cette créature augmente de +2 par instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'elle subit.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, maruz kaldığı her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesi için {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerini +2 artırır. Etkisi, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} sürer.
